metadata.title: Webcam with Microphone for Desktop,1080P HD USB Webcam Live Streaming Laptop PC Computer Web Camera for Video Calling Conferencing Recording Gaming, 3D Noise Reduction
features: ★【Full HD 1080P Webcam with Automatic Light Correction】Equipped with Full HD 1080P resolution and adopted the advanced H.264 compression techonology, the webcam powered by USB 2.0 port, delivers fabulous quality image at 30FPS, Thanks to autofocus Light Correction and HDR technology, Computer webcam auto adjusts color and brightness for natural lighting so you always look your best on web camera even in dim light,making the video and image super clear.

★【Webcam with Built-in Stereo & 3D Automatic Noise-Canceling Microphone】Built-in stereo microphone, capturing audio within 17 feet, makes your communication clear during vedio time. Built-in dual digital stereo microphone with auto noise cancellation. Ensure that the sound is clear and free of noise.CLEARER AND MORE BEAUTIFUL--Perfectly preserves the facial details with a beautifying effect and makes your skin immaculately in an instant.

★【97°Wide-Angle & USB Webcam Plug and Play】It is extremely easy and convenient to use the webcam. Designed with standard UVC/UVA protocol USB connector, it is drive free, no need to download any other driver or software, just plug and play! Supports PCs, laptops with USB ports.The convenient foldable design allows you to easily take it anywhere, and the 6.5’ (1.5 Meter) USB cord is long enough for any task. Just plug it in and you are ready to go!

★【Rotating Base Design & Smooth Live Streaming Webcam with 360 Degree Adjustable Tripod】: Webcam can be stably placed on the desktop and clamped on the display (does not damage the screen). 360 Degree Rotation Webcam & 180 Degree adjustable Clip Folding make it a breeze to secure the camera to computer monitors, laptops, and tripods.We offer a 60-Day money-back & 2-Year free replacement & Lifetime customer service.

★【Widely Compatibility with Multiple Softwares & Systems with Perfectly Privacy Protection】Professional as this webcam is, the compatibility of it is super wide for major software like Skype, Zoom, Facetime, Zoom,Facebook, Skype,YouTube, PotPlayer XBOX,and more. Suitable for Windows XP/2000/7/8/10, Mac OS, Android Smart TV, etc.You can easily use this web camera for online studying, conference, meeting, gaming, video calling recording.
description: Name: 1080P HD USB Webcam with Privacy Cover and Tripod
Focus Mode: Fixed-focus with Auto light correction
Rotatable：360 Degree Rotation Webcam & 180 Degree Clip Folding
➤1080P Full HD Webcam: Computer camera with Full HD glass lens deliver crisp image and crystal clear video at a fluid 30 frames per/sec.
➤ Plug and Play:USB webcam camera can be easily install and use, plug and play, NO additional driver required.

➤Automatic 3D Noise Reduction: This newest webcam with microphone is built-in 2 stereo omnidirectional microphones with automatic noise reduction makes the sound purer and clearer, pick up your voice even at 17ft/ 5M distance to make sure everyone hears the real you.
➤Easy to Set Up: It also features a tripod-ready adjustable universal base that fits to laptops, desktops, computers, PC, LCD monitors.
➤97-Degree Wide View Angle Webcam : Fixed focus Webcam captures HD video at a wide angle up to 97 degrees, Perfect for live streaming, video calling, recording, and conferencing, etc.
➤Wide Compatibility: Work with Windows 7/8/10, Mac OS, Linux, Chrome OS, XBOX Smart TV and Android systems; Suitable for Skype, YouTube, and other mainstream software & App .
